creditline: Gift of Gerald Ray Nelson and Joanne Hogan Nelson
description: standing figure, turned slightly from profile; man wears black robe with wide red sash, red trim at hem, one red cuff and one yellow cuff, tall red and black hat, and tan and red slippers; man has long thick white beard and elongated earlobe
medium: Pen and ink and watercolor on card
provenance: The artist; his stepdaughter, Joanie Nelson, Vancouver, WA
title: Wizard
